mapper.select: select s.*, ( select user_nm from mst_user_info_tb u where s.user_id=u.user_id ) name from mst_board_sub_tb s where sub_parent_no = #{sub_parent_no} order by sub_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into mst_board_sub_tb (sub_parent_no, sub_content, user_id) values(#{sub_parent_no}, #{sub_content}, #{user_id})
